title: Top lane in soloq doesn't even matter.
body:
I've inted and won so many games and lost so many games where I'm 6-0 out of laning phase and tping bot every time I can to help the 0-20 bot lane but we lose anyways cuse bot lane is retarded.

The only thing a top laner needs to do is to die for his damage dealers rofl.

Playing top lane is literally so relaxing because you know it doesn't matter if you die 20x or not.
